original_text: During the Passover festival each year, Pilate let one person go free out of the prison. The people had to ask him for the person that they wanted.
korean_text: 명절이 되면 백성들이 요구하는 대로 죄수 한 사람을 놓아 주는 전례가 있더니

sentences.original_text: During the Passover festival each year
Pilate let one person go free
The people had to ask him
for the person that they wanted
